about_the_game:
Cities Restored is a simulation strategy game about restoring abandoned cities.
Explore the various abandoned cities and embark on the ambitious tasks required to rejuvenate these desolate regions into beautiful, bustling cities. As Mayor, you must rebuild each house and place families in them to get your city moving. Upgrade families, beautify the landscape, restore the infrastructure and whatever you do, keep your citizens happy at all costs!

Rebuild the houses and place the families.
Each family will give you specific details about themselves that will guide you on placing them in the right house. As Mayor, you must identify the perfect house for the family, restore the abandoned house into a beautiful dwelling and place the family in it. Be careful, because if you choose the wrong house, you will make the family very upset, which will lead to disastrous consequences for you.

Upgrade your families to really rejuvenate your city.
From being abandoned for so long, terrible things have happened to the cities. Criminal families have taken control, pests have infected it from all corners, raging fires have appeared and the city looks a filthy mess. By applying special tokens to families, you can give them special jobs which gives them the ability to solve these issues. The families must be within close proximity of the issue in order to have an effect on it.

Move families across the map to take advantage of their benefits.
Because families need to be within a certain area to have effect on it, or to be happy in general, a couple tools are available to you for moving families to other houses to get everyone exactly where they need to be, keeping you in full control.

Unlock tools and upgrades to keep your city expanding.
Unlock more tools and tokens available to you as your city's population grows. You will be given two options from which you must choose wisely to satisfy the needs of your population in that moment.

Features:
  • Captivating gameplay mechanics, highlighted by a variety of upgrades for the restoration of your cities
  • Single player Campaign with dynamically created cities that make every game unique
  • Additional challenge levels providing a stimulating twist on gameplay
  • Stunning top down displays
  • Leaderboard to conquer
